review: Love this thing! I have a very nice TV, but it unfortunately is not smart. So I got this to make it seem much smarter. Great value when you consider the difference between the price of a standard flat screen TV and the price of a smart TV. I love being able to sit back with my phone or tablet and send programs to my TV. If your TV is like mine, pretty but dumb, this is the thing to buy. It will make your dumb TV seem very smart.
